reviews.review_msg: Useless prof. Every time he goes through an example he doesn't go through the hardest parts of it. His tests were brutal, the average for both mt's were 52% and 47% respectively.

It would be helpful to have a background in calculus before taking her course, because she doesn't make calculus any easier. She puts relevant questions in our midterms and you would have seen those questions if you did your homework. In my opinion there's too much theory questions and not enough mechanical ones.
She is very clear and had good depth in maths.

I failed my diagnostic test and still managed to get A- on both my midterms.. that's how great she is. She also dressed up as a karate master and gave us candy on halloween!! just do all the required textbook questions and you'll do fine!

I have no idea what mark I'll get yet because I've only done 1 midterm so far. I can tell you that the 1st midterm is very fair because most of the questions are either related to the questions from the assigned exercises or the exact same questions! online questions and instructor assignments are a guarantee boost for your mark as well.

Absolutely the worst prof ever. He makes soo many mistakes during class it's really hard to follow. Really boring, doesn't tell the class so be quiet and everyone is talking. Not helpful at all, I don't even know who hired this guy as a math Prof....AVOID HIS CLASS if you would like to pass.
